Package DroneSimulation.gui

Class Object

java.lang.Object
DroneSimulation.gui.Object
Direct Known Subclasses:
Drone, HunterDrone, Obstacle
public abstract class Object
extends java.lang.Object
A base class from which drones and obstacles inherit.

  • Constructor Details

    • Object

      public Object()
      Construct an object of type Object. Invokes the second constructor and passes preset values to it.

    • Object

      public Object​(double x, double y, double radius, double speed)
      Construct an object of type Object that holds its co-ordinates, the radius and the speed.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of the object.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the object.
      radius - The radius of the object.
      speed - The speed of the object.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns:
      The object ID of the current object.

    • getX

      public double getX()
      Returns:
      The x co-ordinate of the current object.

    • getY

      public double getY()
      Returns:
      The y co-ordinate of the current object.

    • getRadius

      public double getRadius()
      Returns:
      The radius of the current object.

    • getSpeed

      public double getSpeed()
      Returns:
      The speed of the current object.

    • drawObject

      public void drawObject​(MyCanvas mc)
      Will draw the object onto the canvas.
      Parameters:
      mc - The canvas on which the object will be drawn.

    • checkObject

      protected void checkObject​(DroneArena a)
      Will check if the object is colliding into a wall.
      Parameters:
      a - The drone arena in which the object resides.

    • adjustObject

      protected void adjustObject()
      Will move the object in the direction its facing.

    • hitting

      public boolean hitting​(double otherX, double otherY, double otherRadius)
      Checks whether the object at the given co-ordinates is hitting this object.
      Parameters:
      otherX - The x co-ordinate of the other object.
      otherY - The y co-ordinate of the other object.
      otherRadius - The radius of the other object.
      Returns:
      True if the two objects are hitting, else false.

    • saveString

      public java.lang.String saveString()
      Returns:
      String containing information about the object. Intended to be used when saving a drone arena.
